title: can i get a free name change
body: ok so since like the first week of playing league way back in like 2012 or 2011 i cant rember i had the name "lolfragger" (dont h8 i was young) i have had this name and haven't asked for a new name because well i didn't really care but im thinking of changing my name and i dont want to save up so much ip or buy rp just do it when i should get a free one because they changed it so can i can a new name please

replies.body:
Edit: Yes! For names which they deemed inappropriate and gave a "tempname", you can submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they will assist you in getting a new one free.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ#h1q7
